message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality product at a fair price. If you're interested, you can buy it now and I'll throw in a free [insert something of value here, e.g. a small gift or a discount on the next purchase].
I'm not sure if the product is high quality or low quality, so I'll pass for now. I'd like to wait for more information.

I understand your hesitation last round, but I'm willing to offer you a more detailed description of this product. It's a top-of-the-line model, with advanced features and a long warranty. I've sold several of these to other customers who are very satisfied with their purchase. If you're still unsure, I can also offer to let you inspect the product in person before buying.
Thank you for the additional information, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your desire to see more products, but I'd like to offer you a compromise. I'll give you a special deal on this high-quality product. If you buy it now, I'll throw in a second high-quality product of your choice (from a future round) for $50. This way, you'll get two high-quality products for the price of one. If you don't like it, you can still wait and see more products, but this is a one-time offer.
That's a tempting offer, but I'm not convinced that the second product will be high-quality. I'd like to see more products first and assess the risks.

I completely understand your concerns about the second product. To alleviate those concerns, I'll offer you a guarantee. If you buy this high-quality product now and the second product you choose from a future round is low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for the second product. This way, you can take advantage of the deal without taking on any additional risk.
I'm still not convinced that the second product will be high-quality. I'd like to see more products and get a better sense of the overall quality distribution before committing to this deal.

I understand your concerns about the second product, and I'm willing to offer you a different deal. I'll give you a chance to buy this high-quality product now, and then I'll reveal the quality of the next 3 products in a row (rounds 6-8). If any of those products are low-quality, I'll give you a full refund for this high-quality product. This way, you'll get to see a sample of the quality distribution and make a more informed decision.
Okay, I'll take the deal. I'll buy this high-quality product now and then see the quality of the next 3 products.

Great, I'm glad you decided to take advantage of the deal. Now, as promised, I'll reveal the quality of the next 3 products. The next product (round 6) is indeed high-quality, just like this one. The product from round 7 is low-quality, and the product from round 8 is also low-quality. I'm glad you got to see a sample of the quality distribution. Now, considering the quality of the products you've seen so far, would you like to buy this high-quality product from round 6 for $100?
Now that I've seen the quality distribution, I'm more confident in my decision. I'll buy this high-quality product from round 6 for $100.

I'm glad you're feeling more confident. However, considering the quality distribution you've seen, I'd like to offer you a more nuanced deal. Since you've already bought two high-quality products, and you've seen two low-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a discount on this low-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $80, which is 20% off the original price. This way, you can still get a good deal on a product, even if it's not as high-quality as the others.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discount. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision. Since you've already bought two high-quality products and passed on the low-quality one, I'd like to offer you a more transparent deal. I'll reveal to you that this low-quality product is actually one of the worst products I have, and it's not even worth $80. I'm willing to give it to you for $0, but that's as low as I can go. This way, you can complete your collection and see the full range of products, even if this one isn't the best.
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not interested in buying a product that's not worth anything to me. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your decision, and I appreciate your honesty. Now, considering you've seen a good mix of high-quality and low-quality products, I'd like to offer you a more premium deal. This high-quality product from round 9 is one of the best I have, and I'm willing to give you a 10% discount on the original price. You can buy it for $90, and I'll throw in a free accessory that complements this product perfectly.
I'm interested in this high-quality product, and the discount and free accessory are a nice bonus. I'll buy it for $90.

I'm glad you're interested in this high-quality product! Now, considering you've bought three high-quality products and have a good understanding of the quality distribution, I'd like to offer you a loyalty discount. If you buy this high-quality product from round 10, I'll give you an additional 5% off the original price, making it $95. This way, you can continue to build your collection and take advantage of a great deal.
I appreciate the loyalty discount, and I'm happy to continue buying from you. I'll take the high-quality product from round 10 for $95.

I'm glad you're happy with the loyalty discount! Now, considering you've bought four high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a special 'consecutive high-quality products' discount. If you buy this high-quality product from round 11, I'll give you an additional 10% off the original price, making it $90. This is the lowest price I've offered on any high-quality product so far, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to continue building your collection.
I'm on a hot streak! I'll take the high-quality product from round 11 for $90.

You're on a roll! However, I have to break the streak with this low-quality product. I know you've been getting great deals on high-quality products, but I want to remind you that this one is a rare exception. I'll give you a 'bad luck' discount, which is a 30% discount on the original price. You can buy this low-quality product for $70, but keep in mind that it's not one of my best products.
I appreciate the discount, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision. Considering you've already passed on this low-quality product and the one from round 8, I'll offer you a 'bad product bundle' deal. If you buy this low-quality product from round 13, I'll give you a free upgrade to a high-quality product from a future round (subject to availability). This way, you can take a chance on this low-quality product and potentially get a better one for free.
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a potential free upgrade. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your decision. Considering you've passed on the last two low-quality products, I'm willing to offer you a'makeup deal'. Since you've already bought 5 high-quality products and have a good understanding of the quality distribution, I'll give you a 15% discount on the original price of this high-quality product. You can buy it for $85, and I'll throw in a premium warranty that covers any defects or issues for an additional 2 years.
I'm interested in this high-quality product, and the discount and premium warranty are a great bonus. I'll buy it for $85.

I'm glad you're interested in this high-quality product! Considering you've bought 6 high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a 'VIP customer' deal. If you buy this high-quality product from round 15, I'll give you a 20% discount on the original price, making it $80, and I'll also throw in a personalized thank-you gift and a guaranteed spot in the next round's product selection (meaning you'll get to choose which product you want to buy next).
I'm feeling like a VIP! I'll take the high-quality product from round 15 for $80 and enjoy the perks that come with it.

I'm glad you're enjoying the VIP treatment! However, I have to bring you back down to earth with this low-quality product. But don't worry, you've earned your VIP status, and I want to make sure you still get a good deal. I'll give you a 'VIP discount' of 40% off the original price, making it $60. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on any product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to complete your collection.
I appreciate the VIP discount, but I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a very low price. I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision. Considering you've passed on the last low-quality product, I'm willing to offer you a 'final chance' deal. Since you've been a loyal customer and have bought 7 high-quality products, I'll give you a 25% discount on the original price of this high-quality product, making it $75. This is a one-time offer, and if you decline, I'll have to start fresh with a new customer.
I appreciate the final chance deal, and I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality product. I'll buy it for $75.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on this final high-quality product. Considering you've bought 8 high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a 'legendary customer' deal. If you buy this high-quality product from round 18, I'll give you a 30% discount on the original price, making it $70, and I'll also throw in a lifetime warranty on all the products you've bought from me, including the ones you've already purchased.
I'm feeling like a legendary customer! I'll take the high-quality product from round 18 for $70 and enjoy the lifetime warranty on all my purchases.

I'm glad you're enjoying the legendary customer treatment! Considering you've bought 9 high-quality products in a row, I'm willing to offer you a 'final farewell' deal. Since you've been an exceptional customer, I'll give you a 35% discount on the original price of this high-quality product, making it $65. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on any product, and I think it's a fitting farewell gift for a legendary customer like you.
I'm glad to have been a legendary customer! I'll take the high-quality product from round 19 for $65 and consider it a fitting farewell gift.

It was an absolute pleasure doing business with you, Bob! You've been an exceptional customer, and I'm glad we could work together to find the perfect products for you. As a final gesture of appreciation, I'll give you a 40% discount on the original price of this high-quality product from round 20, making it $60. This is the final product in our 20-round journey together, and I hope you'll treasure it as a reminder of our successful partnership.
It was a pleasure doing business with you too, Alice! I'll take the high-quality product from round 20 for $60 and cherish it as a reminder of our successful partnership.
